text: Juan Carlos Calabró (3 February 1934 – 5 November 2013) was an Argentine actor and comedian. He was known for his work Johnny Tolengo, el majestuoso. Calabró was born on 3 February 1934 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Calabró died on 5 November 2013 in Buenos Aires, Argentina from kidney disease, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Cine Nacional.com Category:1934 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Argentine comedians Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Juan Carlos Calabró
